TopicTitle: Sticky situation I got myself into...

Articles.Content:
So I decided I wanted to put a satellite around the Mun however once I pulled myself into orbit and tried to open my solar panels I ran out of energy and my ship became stranded... Is there any way I could open the solar panels or give it enough energy to open them in notepad so that I don't lose my precious ship that took around 2-3 hours to put into Mun's orbit?

Edit: Satelite diapered randomly so I no longer need assistance sorry.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Asumata
